title: The Current State and Challenges of Online Learning (OL): Stakeholder-Centered Design Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning experience or educational operation experience
context.additional_context: A course for corporate managers over 40, analyzing the current status and challenges of online learning in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, and acquiring design strategies based on stakeholder priorities.

learning_goals: They can explain three or more current trends and key challenges in online learning.
They can analyze and prioritize stakeholders (instructors, learners, administrators) within an organization.
They can suggest at least two strategies for effective online learning design in resource-constrained technological environments.
They can derive practical measures to reduce learner dropout rates.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
